New Records: Chris Jordan becomes the first English player to take a hat-trick at a T20 World Cup.
Key Match Events: England win by ten wickets with 62 balls remaining.
Jos Buttler hits five sixes in an over.
Pre-Game Insights: England win the toss and choose to bowl first.
Post-Match Reflections: Jos Buttler expressed happiness and paid tribute to the bowling depth, particularly Livingstone and Rashid.
USA captain Aaron Jones reflected on the team's performance and their enjoyment of the tournament.
Adil Rashid named player of the match and praised the bowling unit and Chris Jordan.
Miscellaneous Highlights: England are the first defending champions to reach a men's T20 World Cup semi-final in a decade.
USA's victory over Pakistan was memorable.
England need 116 runs to win and achieved it in less than 12 overs to give themselves the best chance of topping the group.
